statements: SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'login'
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'malware'
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time, source_ip, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'data_transfer' ORDER BY event_time DESC
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10'
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1'
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time, source_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_type LIKE 'Failed%' AND source_ip <> '127.0.0.1' ORDER BY event_time ASC
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-10 23:59:59'
SELECT event_id, event_type, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%malware%' ORDER BY event_time DESC
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT event_id, event_type, EVENT_TIMESTAMP FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT * FROM incident_logs ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_timestamp FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_description LIKE '%ransomware%' AND incident_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM security_events JOIN incident_logs ON security_events.event_id = incident_logs.related_event_id;
SELECT * FROM security_events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM security_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM incident_details WHERE severity = 'High'
SELECT correlation_id, event1_id, event2_id FROM event_correlation
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM security_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date
SELECT incident_id, description, severity FROM incident_details WHERE severity = 'High'
SELECT event1_id, event2_id, correlation_type FROM event_correlation WHERE correlation_type LIKE '%Pattern%'
SELECT * FROM event_correlation ORDER BY correlation_id ASC
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT incident_id, incident_time, incident_description FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, event_id, log_time, log_message FROM event_logs WHERE event_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_time, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, u.email, u.role, e.event_time FROM users u JOIN security_events e ON u.user_id = e.event_id ORDER BY e.event_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT incident_id) AS total_incidents, assigned_to FROM incidents GROUP BY assigned_to HAVING total_incidents > 1;
SELECT e.event_id, e.event_type, l.log_message FROM security_events e LEFT JOIN event_logs l ON e.event_id = l.event_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, description, severity FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT id, alert_type, message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Security';
SELECT username, email, role FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM resources WHERE type = 'Server' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, severity FROM incidents WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'database' ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT id, alert_type, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE status = 'closed' AND outcome LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY id ASC;
